title: Project Archive
brief_description: The project archive of Brisbane programmer, Nick Marentes, tells the story behind the creation of each of his homebrew games, as well as his hopes and dreams of becoming a millionaire. Marentes wrote games for the Tandy range of computers, beginning with the TRS-80.

constellations_other.name: Beyond the game industry
constellations_other.description: While the game industry garners a lot of publicity, digital games have long been created outside the official industry, and the social and cultural significance of games has always exceeded official channels.
